abstract: General Dynamics said it agreed to acquire Zurich-based Jet Aviation, a privately held provider of business-aviation services, for about $2.25 billion in cash.
snippet: General Dynamics said it agreed to acquire Zurich-based Jet Aviation, a privately held provider of business-aviation services, for about $2.25 billion in cash.
lead_paragraph: General Dynamics said it agreed to acquire Zurich-based Jet Aviation, a privately held provider of business-aviation services, for about $2.25 billion in cash.

headline.main: General Dynamics to Buy Jet Aviation for $2.25 Billion
